Chancellor's Undergraduate Research Fellowship

I have been named a Chancellor’s Undergraduate Research Fellowship for the Spring 2016 semester. This award is in support of my thesis work on a neuroinformatic approach to characterizing autonomic regulation in response to vestibular stimuli.

Written on January 8th, 2016 by Ethan Alexander García Baker
Feel free to share!
